caption.p: Boxplots (bar—median; red triangular—mean; box—1st and 3rd interquartile ranges) showing potential percent changes in the IHA metrics at the sampling sites of the Treene (a–e) and Kinzig (f–j) catchments for the two defined 20‐year periods of horizon 2050 (2046–2065) and horizon 2090 (2080–2099) compared to the baseline (1998–2017). For more details, see Fig. SF1
